description:
Demolition of existing pavilion and erection of a new four storey podium and alterations to the existing towers to provide 3 'A' Class units (1,834 sq.m.) 64 residential units, education or community facilities (1,834sq.m) and 839 units of student accommodation with associated landscaping and access.

Approval of Details pursuant to condition NS08 Application No. P070981 of consent dated 3rd March 2006.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: A landscaping scheme,  detailing the  positions of planned and existing underground services in relation to proposed and retained trees and specifying the methodology for replanting in the existing pits, as appropriate, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority before any part of the development hereby granted permission is commenced. 

REASON: To ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
